grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 虐待【ギャクタイ】abuse, ill-treatment, maltreatment, mistreatment, cruelty
自虐【ジギャク】self-torture, masochism, inflicting damage to oneself
凌虐【リョウギャク】humiliation, indignity, affront, assault
kun reading compounds: 虐げる【しいたげる】to oppress, to persecute, to tyrannize
